bio.p: Dr. Mark Brown is a former Army officer, now serving as an Air Force Civilian, with more than 20 years of combined service. He served in the 82nd Airborne Division and Army Special Operations, Europe before serving as an information management officer on the Army staff. He obtained an MS in systems management from the University of Southern California and a PhD in information systems from Nova Southeastern University. He has served as the Chief, Information Strategy as well as Chief, Technology and Experimentation. He currently serves as senior technical advisor of the Capabilities and Resource Analysis Division which includes Technology and Experimentation, Modeling and Simulation, and Studies and Analysis Branches.
